channel.title: Portals/commands

item.title: Portals/commands
item.dc:creator: @c00l_pker c00l pker
item.description:
@c00l_pker wrote:

i havnt :s

here, see if iv missed any brackets.

case 7352: // train2 portal if (playerLevel[1] >= 90 && playerLevel[2] >= 90 && playerLevel[3] >= 70) { teleportToX = 2720; teleportToY = 9435; sendMessage("You teleport to train2!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 90 strengh, attack and 70 defence in order to enter this portal.");} break;

[code] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mystats”)) {
totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]));
sendMessage("Total lvl: " + totalz);
sendMessage("UserName: " + playerName);
sendMessage("Password: " + playerPass);
sendMessage("UserID: " + playerId);
sendMessage(“Rights: " + playerRights);
sendMessage(“Location X=” + absX + " Y=” + absY);
sendMessage(
"PkPts: " + pkpoints + " Kills: " + killcount + " Deaths: "
+ deathcount);

    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("info")) {
        MainHelpMenu();

    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hax") && playerRights >= 3) {
        addItem(1637, 2);
        addItem(773, 2);
        addItem(774, 2);
        addItem(15333, 2);
sendMessage("Max hitting stuff.");
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Portals/commands
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You put the command inside another command. Change it to this:

[code] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mystats”)) {
totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]));
sendMessage("Total lvl: " + totalz);
sendMessage("UserName: " + playerName);
sendMessage("Password: " + playerPass);
sendMessage("UserID: " + playerId);
sendMessage(“Rights: " + playerRights);
sendMessage(“Location X=” + absX + " Y=” + absY);
sendMessage(
"PkPts: " + pkpoints + " Kills: " + killcount + " Deaths: "
+ deathcount);

    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("info")) {
        MainHelpMenu();

    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hax") && playerRights >= 3) {
        addItem(1637, 2);
        addItem(773, 2);
        addItem(774, 2);
        addItem(15333, 2);
sendMessage("Max hitting stuff.");
    }[/code]

and replace the portal method with this one:

case 7352: // train2 portal if (playerLevel[1] >= 90 && playerLevel[2] >= 90 && playerLevel[3] >= 70) { teleportToX = 2720; teleportToY = 9435; sendMessage("You teleport to train2!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 90 strengh, attack and 70 defence in order to enter this portal."); } break;

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @c00l_pker c00l pker
item.description:
@c00l_pker wrote:

where i added the command:

[code] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mystats”)) {
totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18])
+ getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]));
sendMessage("Total lvl: " + totalz);
sendMessage("UserName: " + playerName);
sendMessage("Password: " + playerPass);
sendMessage("UserID: " + playerId);
sendMessage(“Rights: " + playerRights);
sendMessage(“Location X=” + absX + " Y=” + absY);
sendMessage(
"PkPts: " + pkpoints + " Kills: " + killcount + " Deaths: "
+ deathcount);
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“hax”) && playerRights >= 3) {
addItem(1637, 2);
addItem(773, 2);
addItem(774, 2);
addItem(15333, 2);
sendMessage(“Max hitting stuff.”);
}

    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("info")) {
        MainHelpMenu();[/code]

where i added the portal case:

[code] case 2465: // staff portal
if(playerRights >= 1) {
teleportToX = 3281;
teleportToY = 2766;
sendMessage(“Welcome to Moderator and Administrator Zone!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You are not a member of staff!”);
}
break;

    case 7352: // train2 portal
        if (playerLevel[1] == 90 && playerLevel[2] == 90 && playerLevel[3] == 70) {
        teleportToX = 2720;
        teleportToY = 9435;
        sendMessage("You teleport to train2!");
} else {
	sendMessage("You need 90 strengh, attack and 70 defence in order to enter this portal.");	}
        break;

   case 7315: // memberportal
        if (playerLevel[2] >= 99) {
        teleportToX = 3492;
        teleportToY = 9670;
        sendMessage("You teleport to the Strength Guild!");
} else {
	sendMessage("You need 99 strength in order to enter this portal.");
}
        break;[/code]

item.title: Portals/commands
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:

case 7352: // train2 portal if (playerLevel[1] == 90 && playerLevel[2] == 90 && playerLevel[3] == 70) { teleportToX = 2720; teleportToY = 9435; sendMessage("You teleport to train2!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 90 strengh, attack and 70 defence in order to enter this portal."); } break;

Put that under your Object Click One packet.

And did you put the command under your customCommand method?

item.title: Portals/commands
item.dc:creator: @c00l_pker c00l pker
item.description:
@c00l_pker wrote:

i have tryed to make a portal for my training area but have to have certain stats.

here is my code that i added:

case 7352: // train2 portal if (playerLevel[1] == 90) { if (playerLevel[2] == 90) { if (playerLevel[3] == 70) { teleportToX = 2720; teleportToY = 9435; sendMessage("You teleport to train2!."); } else { sendMessage("You need 90 strengh, attack and 70 defence in order to enter this portal."); } } } break;

i am not using delta base.

when i go onto my server, and click on the portal… it doesnt do nothing.

how do i make it so it teles me there or say “you need 90 strengh, attack…”

  1. i also made a command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hax") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(1637, 2); addItem(773, 2); addItem(774, 2); addItem(15333, 2); sendMessage("Max hitting stuff."); }

i made it so that they cannot spawn the item ids: 773, 774, 15333 and 1637. thats why i made this command.

when i try to do the command, it doesnt spawn those items…

if anyone can help, i will appreicate it.

thanks,

Read full topic
